title: Why does the City of Wilmington allow the homeless and panhandlers to stand on the narrow concrete medians at the Market Street and College Road overpass to solicit donations?  (This is a very unsafe practice as the individuals are very close to the flow of traffic and to drivers windows when vehicles are waiting to turn. Why isn\'t the panhandling law enforced at this location?)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8183
